title: Total lobbying spending U.S. 1998 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 22 data points.
Overall Spending in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Spending in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 1998 to 1999, rapidly increasing from 1999 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2016, roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Spending in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3.51 was reached at Year 2010
Minimum Spending in billion U.S. dollars about 1.44 was reached at Year 1999
